description: Try our easy to follow Herbed Mayo Dip With Vegetable Crudités recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crudité,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Herbed Mayo Dip With Vegetable Crudités Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Heinz Seriously Good Rosemary & Sea Salt Mayonnaise
4 large washed white potatoes, cut into thick wedges
3 rosemary sprigs, leaves picked, finely chopped (save 1 sprig to garnish)
1 small red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thickly sliced
1 small yellow capsicum, halved, deseeded, thickly sliced
3 free range eggs, soft boiled, halved, herbed mayo dip
0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Place potato, oil and two-thirds of the rosemary on tray and toss to combine. Bake for 35 minutes, turning occasionally, or until golden and tender.
Meanwhile, to make the herbed mayo dip, place all of the ingredients in a small bowl and stir to combine. Top with remaining rosemary.
Arrange dip, vegetables, egg and potato on a large platter. Scatter over extra rosemary, then serve.
